name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Split and Mute for tabs stream

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detach or regroup all stream tabs into separate windows with one click, with layout options for multiple screens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Split and Mute for tabs stream,

Detach all your Twitch, Kick, Youtube streaming video tabs into separate windows with a single click and choose on which screen (or group them), mute all tabs in 1 click or only activate the sound of the active tab.

Simplify your navigation by organizing your tasks with flexible layout options. Save time and optimize your productivity by structuring your digital workspace according to your needs, while maintaining total control over your browsing environment.
